name: Chadros Higelyges (Brown Beard)
text: When Attacking: If you have 1 or less Characters with 6000 or more power, this character gets +1000 power during this turn.

effect.text: If you have 1 or less Characters with 6000 or more power, this character gets +1000 power during this turn.
conditions: you have 1 or less Characters with 6000 or more power
